I am absolutely guilty of laughing at the many people who have lost thousands or hundreds of dollars by ‚Ä¶

item.title: The Federal Reserve Brings the Pain
item.description:
What a difference three months makes. As recently as March 2022, Federal Reserve officials were still optimistic that Americans wouldn‚Äôt need to endure slower growth or higher unemployment to get inflation back on track. Prices were expected to normalize more or less on their own after a few years‚Äîeven with Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine and‚Ä¶
